trait.name: Cunning Action
text: A ratfolk rogue can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Nimbleness
text: A ratfolk rogue can move through the space of any creature size Medium or larger.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: A ratfolk rogue has advantage on its attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ratfolk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally is capable of attacking.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
text: A ratfolk rogue deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of one of its allies that isn't incapacitated and the rogue doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Rat Dagger Flurry
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., three targets. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
